Still traumatised by that night in Lansdowne against Denmark. Lost 5-1. Here is a Sisto shirt from that horrible night. https://t.co/1fK330ldYO
Play-off against Denmark in a bitterly cold night in Copenhagen got off to a reasonable start with a 0-0 draw.  Stephen Ward shirt from that match. https://t.co/vYzny2kfIr

The tournament itself was made with a 1-0 win against Italy.  And I‚Äôm chuffed to have this Immobile jersey from that historic night. https://t.co/ZZMzbnvf98
Play-off win against Bosnia was fantastic.  Here‚Äôs the shirt Dzeko wore in Dublin when we qualified. https://t.co/2yhPUQT2t6

The play-off against Estonia was decided after Ireland won the first leg 4-0.  Estonia‚Äôs Stepanov got sent off and here is his shirt. https://t.co/feWxyHTSS0
We qualified for the 2012 European Championship.  @KevinDoyle1983 was issued this shirt for the home game against Macedonia. https://t.co/M79GTpD48i

Should have beaten Bulgaria but we didn‚Äôt. This is a @stephenhunt1010 shirt from that game. https://t.co/YxeSHWE4jL
